name: Killer
text: On K.O. If your Leader has the type 'Supernovas', look at 3 cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to 1 'Supernovas' or 'Kid Pirates' type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: If your Leader has the type 'Supernovas', look at 3 cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to 1 'Supernovas' or 'Kid Pirates' type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
